summary: Adds a free player home to Dawnstar, on the Northern edge of the bay.
descriptionHtml:
Name: Minor City Homes: Dawnview
Version: 1.1
Date: 02/15/2012
Category: Buildings
Author(s): Somnyus

Version History
=======
Version 1.0, 02/15/2012 
	- Initial release.
version 1.1, 02/18/2012 
	- Fixed NavMesh so followers will properly enter/exit.

Description
===========
Adds a free player home to Dawnstar.

Location
========
On the Northern edge of Dawnstar bay.

Details
=======
Dawnview is a free player home in the Northern town of Dawnstar. Sitting on the Northern edge of the bay.
The main floor has a kitchen, dining area and double bed.
A trapdoor in the far corner of the house leads to a basement with a mushroom garden, enchanting and alchemy area. There is plenty of safe, non-respawning storage throughout the house.
Outside is a sitting area around a fire, a tanning rack and workbench.
There\'s also a small fishing dock and rowboat in front of the house.

This is a first in a series of four house mods that will add houses to the minor cities of Skyrim: Dawnstar, Falkreath, Winterhold and Morthal.

Future versions of the mod will have interactive bookshelves, weapon display among other tweaks. So if you have any suggestions to improve this house, feel free to contact me!

Install
=======
Extract MCH_Dawnview_v1.0.esp to \\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data
Or use Nexus Mod Manager (recommended): http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/content/modmanager/

Uninstall
=========
Delete the MCH_Dawnview_v1.0.esp from your data folder
Or uninstall through Nexus Mod Manager

Incompatibility
===============
None that I\'m aware of.

Known Issues or Bugs
====================
None reported yet.

Contact
=======
You can find me on the official Elder Scrolls forums as \'Somnyus\'
You can find me on Skyrim Nexus as \'Somnyus\'
You can find me on http://www.skyrimrealestate.com/forum as \'Somnyus\'
You can send me an email here: Somnyus AT gmail DOT com

Credits
=======
Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
Skyrim Nexus for being a great host.
The community at Skyre, for being ever so helpful.
LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on.


Tools Used
==========
7-Zip - http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=15579
TES Construction Set - http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=11367
Readme Generator - http://HammondsLegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp


Licensing/Legal
===============
Please contact me and obtain my permission before re-packaging any part of
this mod. If I do not respond within 2 weeks, feel free to do whatever you
like with this mod.
author: Somnyus

files.name: Minor City Homes - Dawnview 1-1
files.changelogHtml: Fixed: Corrected NavMesh so followers will properly enter/exit.
